data.lyric:
[ti:NEW MAGIC WAND (Explicit)]
[ar:Tyler, The Creator]
[al:IGOR (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]NEW MAGIC WAND (Explicit) - Tyler, The Creator
[00:00.13]Lyrics by：Tyler Okonma
[00:00.26]Composed by：Tyler Okonma
[00:00.39]Sometimes you gotta close a door to open a window
[00:15.51]I saw a photo you looked joyous
[00:18.96]My eyes are green I eat my veggies
[00:22.36]I need to get her out the picture
[00:25.75]She's really f**kin' up my frame
[00:29.22]She's not developed like we are
[00:31.08]Like magic like magic like magic gone
[00:34.81]New magic new magic new magic wand
[00:37.84]Like magic like magic like magic wand
[00:41.32]New magic new magic new magic wand
[00:43.45]My brother said I'm on the spectrum
[00:46.38]Don't call me selfish I ain't sharin'
[00:49.85]This 60-40 isn't workin'
[00:53.29]I want a hundred of your time you're mine
[00:58.38]Please don't leave me now
[01:01.52]Please don't leave me now
[01:04.56]Don't leave
[01:05.10]Please don't leave me now
[01:08.25]Please don't leave me now
[01:11.40]Don't leave
[01:11.96]Please don't leave me now
[01:12.87]Don't leave
[01:13.21]Like magic like magic like magic wand
[01:15.23]Please don't leave me now
[01:16.26]I can make her leave
[01:17.19]New magic new magic new magic wand
[01:18.68]Please don't leave me now
[01:19.63]Don't leave
[01:20.00]Like magic like magic like magic wand
[01:21.78]Please don't leave me now
[01:22.75]New magic new magic new magic wand
[01:25.28]I wanna be found passenger in your car
[01:28.60]Don't leave
[01:29.08]You wanna be mean mixed signals don't talk
[01:32.00]I can make her leave
[01:32.89]She's gonna be dead I just got a magic wand
[01:35.97]We can finally be together
[01:40.37]You roll the dice hit a seven sure you right
[01:43.66]Beginner's luck you not my first who gives a f**k
[01:47.10]Your other one evaporate we celebrate
[01:50.53]You under oath now pick a side and if you don't
[01:53.97]I'll pick you both
[01:54.54]Run run run run
[01:57.11]Run run run run
[01:58.73]It's not a joke murder she wrote
[02:19.74]Ayo take one look in the mirror implications so clear
[02:23.46]I live life with no fear except for the idea
[02:25.92]That one day you won't be here
[02:27.58]I will not fetch the ball
[02:28.85]Eyes are green I eat my vegetables
[02:30.56]It has nothin' to do with that broad
[02:32.40]But if it did guarantee she'd be gone well
[02:34.38]I got a plan 'bout to walk in the pen
[02:36.01]If you can't understand I'm a hawk in the gym
[02:37.90]Eyes on the prize got weight on my chest
[02:39.45]That I need to get off or I ain't talkin' to them
[02:41.32]Can't be in the picture if it got no frame
[02:42.95]Gon' let the world know 'cause I ain't got no shame
[02:44.54]Blow the whole spot up 'cause I ain't
[02:46.22]I wanna share last names I wanna be your number one
[02:48.16]Not your other one keep it on the low
[02:49.78]I'm in my right mind keep it on a high
[02:51.76]Janis Joplin spillin' feelings now I'm out here moppin' 'em
[02:54.18]Four on the floor pack up your bags we hit the store
[02:56.71]Grab our supplies no need for masks bust through the door
[02:59.31]Get the job done like retirement I admit you look concerned
[03:01.69]New magic wand
data.trans:
[ti:NEW MAGIC WAND (Explicit)]
[ar:Tyler, The Creator]
[al:IGOR (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.13]//
[00:00.26]//
[00:00.39]有时 只能走到绝境才能看到希望
[00:15.51]我看到照片里的你很开心
[00:18.96]我吃着蔬菜 眼神里充满了嫉妒
[00:22.36]我要让她消失在相片里
[00:25.75]她破坏了我的好心情
[00:29.22]她和你的关系没有我们之间那么要好
[00:31.08]像是施了魔法 彻底消失了
[00:34.81]新的魔法棒
[00:37.84]像是拥有了新的魔法棒
[00:41.32]新的魔法棒
[00:43.45]弟弟说我得了自闭症
[00:46.38]不要说我自私 我不愿一味地分享
[00:49.85]付出大于索取又有什么用
[00:53.29]我想要你全部的时间 你是我的
[00:58.38]现在请不要离开我
[01:01.52]现在请不要离开我
[01:04.56]不要离开
[01:05.10]现在请不要离开我
[01:08.25]现在请不要离开我
[01:11.40]不要离开
[01:11.96]现在请不要离开我
[01:12.87]不要离开
[01:13.21]像是拥有了新的魔法棒
[01:15.23]现在请不要离开我
[01:16.26]我可以让她离开
[01:17.19]新的魔法棒
[01:18.68]现在请不要离开我
[01:19.63]不要离开
[01:20.00]像是拥有了新的魔法棒
[01:21.78]现在请不要离开我
[01:22.75]新的魔法棒
[01:25.28]我想坐在你的副驾驶
[01:28.60]不要离开
[01:29.08]你想严肃一点 信号混乱 不要说话
[01:32.00]我可以让她离开
[01:32.89]她死定了 我有一根魔法棒
[01:35.97]我们最终会在一起的
[01:40.37]你掷骰子 扔中了幸运数字七 你是对的
[01:43.66]新手运气好 你不是我的初恋 谁会在乎这个呢
[01:47.10]你的另一半消失了 我们一起庆贺
[01:50.53]你发过誓了 现在 必须做出选择 如果不选的话
[01:53.97]我两个都要
[01:54.54]快跑
[01:57.11]快跑
[01:58.73]不跟你开玩笑 你要是选她 肯定死定了
[02:19.74]看一眼镜子 我的暗示得很明显了
[02:23.46]我的人生没有恐惧 只是我很怕
[02:25.92]有一天你会从我身边消失
[02:27.58]我不擅长和坏人相处
[02:28.85]我吃着蔬菜 眼神里充满了嫉妒
[02:30.56]这不是心胸不够宽广的问题
[02:32.40]如果我真的很小气的话 她肯定死定了
[02:34.38]我有一个计划 可能会让我身陷囹圄
[02:36.01]你可能还不明白 我像是一只雄鹰
[02:37.90]眼睛一直盯着猎物 胸口仿佛压着一块大石头
[02:39.45]我必须摆脱这种压力感 或者再也不和他们说话
[02:41.32]不会再让她有任何出现的机会
[02:42.95]要让全世界知道 我不会觉得羞愧
[02:44.54]毁灭一切 因为我不
[02:46.22]我不想让你跟我姓 我想成为你的首选之人
[02:48.16]而不是备胎 保持低调
[02:49.78]我头脑十分清醒 一直十分兴奋
[02:51.76]我像Janis Joplin一样 用音乐表达自己的情感
[02:54.18]开着四档手动变速汽车 收拾好你的行李 我们去到商店
[02:56.71]拿好我们需要的东西 不需要戴面具 我们不是破门而入的强盗
[02:59.31]把事情做完 像是要退休了一样 我承认你看起来很担心
[03:01.69]新的魔法棒
